62e679ae-6bb1-43d9-938e-8079c45fa23b.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
62e679ae-6bb1-43d9-938e-8079c45fa23b.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from most people and animals (although pests or carrion-eating scavengers might be attracted to you!)

9ddd07d4-d055-4d09-9973-78856fa48f42.name: Oxygen Storage
9ddd07d4-d055-4d09-9973-78856fa48f42.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

c78e0a8f-97d7-45c4-bcbb-b8fa1d52afdf.name: Oxygen Storage
c78e0a8f-97d7-45c4-bcbb-b8fa1d52afdf.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

730dfcfd-2d7d-4a27-a513-b13cb3332704.name: Oxygen Storage
730dfcfd-2d7d-4a27-a513-b13cb3332704.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

04f7565c-332a-43fd-8cdf-7ef8c6e8e492.name: Oxygen Storage
04f7565c-332a-43fd-8cdf-7ef8c6e8e492.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

143e20b3-cd46-4dc8-8498-447c823a6cfc.name: Oxygen Storage
143e20b3-cd46-4dc8-8498-447c823a6cfc.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

200c3dac-1eca-46c7-9942-0fa4272fe3e0.name: High Pain Threshold
200c3dac-1eca-46c7-9942-0fa4272fe3e0.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

72776ee1-8c6e-4ec9-a9d7-3937d295cfe9.name: Diffuse
72776ee1-8c6e-4ec9-a9d7-3937d295cfe9.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

94a24dc3-4e44-4580-adc5-961869de0943.name: Homogenous
94a24dc3-4e44-4580-adc5-961869de0943.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

17e7aceb-a4a6-43c4-ba87-48f665231f2d.name: No Blood
17e7aceb-a4a6-43c4-ba87-48f665231f2d.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

103609a5-8763-463b-9bf9-8296a29c5729.name: No Brain
103609a5-8763-463b-9bf9-8296a29c5729.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

5dab9421-3444-4ee6-84b6-085f36248865.name: No Eyes
5dab9421-3444-4ee6-84b6-085f36248865.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

bfbbc5aa-e5e8-4c2c-b2f7-963d8a39018a.name: No Head
bfbbc5aa-e5e8-4c2c-b2f7-963d8a39018a.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

21d47eda-98d4-4877-811a-2428bd62a23a.name: No Neck
21d47eda-98d4-4877-811a-2428bd62a23a.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

cd5f55e7-b627-49f4-921a-01eba47506c3.name: No Vitals
cd5f55e7-b627-49f4-921a-01eba47506c3.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

bc0ae37c-fddc-482a-b10c-b4fcfe6832e4.name: Unliving
bc0ae37c-fddc-482a-b10c-b4fcfe6832e4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5
